Text: ENJOY ENJOY Expeditions Conquistador 2013 New PC Game by FLT, fairlight on the go, Yeah!
Fast download and works perfectly fine so far (1 hour into the game), thank you HeroMaster, cheers!
Can you spread European diseases and massacre natives﻿ in this?

@ Kona_Guy

Well, there are missions that are about poisoning that causing a plague, massacring people also is in it. Game is based on history and a "grey morality" model, not some good-evil struggle, whre you're a good guy.
